messages.messageContent: Was the standby unit activated? CENSORED is asking
Yes
Yes we heard them talking near the house
Activated
Take care of yourselves and all your families 🙏🏻
Big strong hug to all of us ❤️
Lock the safe rooms
Handle up
Don't open for anyone ❤️
Can someone calm us down here and say there are soldiers and no terrorists in our kibbutz 😨
There are terrorists
Don't open doors to people who look like soldiers
They are dressed like soldiers
Hold safe room doors

Hello loved ones
There's some pressure and terror here, mainly from my side. I would greatly appreciate if someone could not write things that are a bit beyond what's needed.

Joining CENSORED, and please don't write names/houses/neighborhoods
Not everyone can handle this information this way

We are still in the middle of the event. Make sure to lock your houses.
In the last few hours we've been in contact with MDA, but ambulances haven't arrived yet.
We'll continue to update
Don't share names on WhatsApp!!!!
The messaging system isn't working, CENSORED occasionally sends messages to kibbutz members distribution.. I'll share here for those who aren't members
The army will start searching between houses, only identify if you hear 13, 13. Otherwise don't answer!

Pay attention,
Don't open the door to calls like police and standby unit.
Only to 13 13 or Duvdevan force
IDF wants to attack from the air in the settlement. Asking to inform all residents not to leave the safe rooms....
Duvdevan force is inside the kibbutz they passed by our house

We're in the safe room
Did anyone hear knocking at our door?😞
Believe they'll break down the door.. we're in the same situation
The house doors are locked
Has anyone heard from CENSORED?????
Has anyone heard from CENSORED??
Can someone who feels they can calm me down call me?
IDF is conducting aerial fire inside the kibbutz everyone get into safe rooms now
CENSORED and CENSORED they've lived there less than a year, their house is on the fence
Trying to contact them. Know them?
Does anyone know?
There are reports of an announcement telling people to come out with hands up, don't listen to any announcements...
Evacuation by the army is beginning. They will knock on the door and announce it. Wait patiently
And what about those who can't hear from the safe room
Waiting and hoping. Suffocating in the safe room with a 3-month-old baby
They broke my door and came into the house
What do they say when they come to evacuate? How will we know it's IDF? Do they just break in for everyone?

They say IDF IDF
Ask battalion
They say which battalion they are
And at our place a neighbor also came shouting that it's okay
Where are they evacuating us to?
Please go to the houses near the pool please
I'm begging!!!!!!
Terrorists in our house
Please help
Enough please they are in the row before us
They're saying they claim they're our forces
Can CENSORED verify?
Can they please go near the pool pleaseeeee
Air strike planned in the kibbutz area

How is it logical that this is still going on?????
Where is our army?
Why aren't they flying all the special forces and battalions in the country to Kfar Aza???
Has anyone heard from CENSORED
Questions we're all asking
Is there any way to contact CENSORED? The family is worried
Has anyone heard anything from my parents? CENSORED?...
Any information about CENSORED?
Is there someone coordinating the list of evacuees?
CENSORED is in the rightmost house. I can't locate the house number
In young generation

What about CENSORED? Has anyone heard anything?
What about CENSORED?
What about CENSORED ??
Please a bit of information about what's happening in young generation

CENSORED
What's happening in young generation????
Please what's happening in young generation ??????????
Still don't know anything
Don't get close to Road 4 anyone leaving the area 🙏🏼
Please let them go through young gen!!! They're there!!!!!!!
CENSORED does anyone know how she is?
I saw her in Hodaya early morning
She and the whole family were evacuated from the kibbutz

I'm here CENSORED
We were evacuated early morning CENSORED
Does anyone know if CENSORED my brother got on a bus
He was evacuated but not available
Got on

Now SWAT team in young gen going house by house
CENSORED
Yessssss
CENSORED!!!!!!!! Please she's in young generation
Please let them take apart young gen
